definition[0]: the seat where a judge or magistrate sits in a court of law
example[0]: Would the prisoner please approach the bench?
definition[1]: the position of being a judge or magistrate in a court of law
note[0]: sit/serve on the bench (=work as a judge or magistrate)
example[1]: He was appointed to the bench last year.
definition[2]: the seat where members of a sports team sit when they are not playing in the game
example[2]: Batts and Dorigo are on the bench tonight.
example[3]: Simpson came off the bench to play in midfield.
